<table border="0" width="100%"> <tbody> <tr> <td align="left"> <p> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/files/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/texturing.html">Texture mapping</a> maps images to geometry nodes. </p> <ul> <li> Images can be provided by <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/X3dTooltips.html#ImageTexture" target="tooltips">ImageTexture</a>, <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/X3dTooltips.html#MovieTexture" target="tooltips">MovieTexture</a> or <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/X3dTooltips.html#PixelTexture" target="tooltips">PixelTexture</a> nodes. </li> <li> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/X3dTooltips.html#TextureCoordinate" target="tooltips">TextureCoordinate</a> and <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/X3dTooltips.html#TextureCoordinateGenerator" target="tooltips">TextureCoordinateGenerator</a> can select image-texture coordinates for direct matching with geometry vertices. Animation can be provided by <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/X3dTooltips.html#TexCoordChaser2D" target="tooltips">TexCoordChaser2D</a> and <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/X3dTooltips.html#TexCoordDamper2D" target="tooltips">TexCoordDamper2D</a> </li> <li> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/X3dTooltips.html#TextureProperties" target="tooltips">TextureProperties</a> provides precise fine-grained control over application of image textures to geometry. </li> <li> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/X3dTooltips.html#TextureTransform" target="tooltips">TextureTransform</a> shifts 2D texture coordinates for positioning, orienting and scaling image textures on geometry. </li> </ul> <p> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/files/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/texturing.html#MultiTexture">Multitexture techniques</a> apply multiple textures to a single set of geometry, enabling a variety of visual effects such as light mapping and environment mapping. </p> <ul> <li> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/X3dTooltips.html#MultiTexture" target="tooltips">MultiTexture</a> node can contain multiple ImageTexture, MovieTexture and PixelTexture nodes. </li> <li> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/X3dTooltips.html#MultiTextureCoordinate" target="tooltips">MultiTextureCoordinate</a> node can contain TextureCoordinate or TextureCoordinateGenerator nodes. </li> <li> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/X3dTooltips.html#MultiTextureTransform" target="tooltips">MultiTextureTransform</a> node contains TextureTransform nodes that correspond to each texture image. </li> </ul> <p> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/files/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/texture3D.html">3D texture</a> techniques apply volumetric textures that describe a volume in space, rather than a flat surface. </p> <ul> <li> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/X3dTooltips.html#ComposedTexture3D" target="tooltips">ComposedTexture3D</a>, <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/X3dTooltips.html#ImageTexture3D" target="tooltips">ImageTexture3D</a> and <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/X3dTooltips.html#TextureCoordinate4D" target="tooltips">PixelTexture3D</a> define 3D image-based texture maps. </li> <li> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/X3dTooltips.html#TextureCoordinate3D" target="tooltips">TextureCoordinate3D</a> and <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/X3dTooltips.html#TextureCoordinate4D" target="tooltips">TextureCoordinate4D</a> map 3D textures to vertices. </li> <li> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/X3dTooltips.html#TextureTransform3D" target="tooltips">TextureTransform3D</a> and <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/X3dTooltips.html#TextureTransformMatrix3D" target="tooltips">TextureTransformMatrix3D</a> apply a 3D transformation to texture coordinates. </li> </ul> </td> <td align="center" width="140"> <p> <a href="index.html" target="_top"><img alt="Texture Map Comparisons Cylinder" title="Texture Map Comparisons Cylinder" hspace="10" src="TextureMapComparisonsCylinderXj3D.png" width="90" height="80" align="middle"/></a> </p> <p> <a href="index.html" target="_top"><img alt="Texture Map Comparisons Rectangle" title="Texture Map Comparisons Rectangle" hspace="10" src="TextureMapComparisonsRectangleXj3D.png" width="127" height="80" align="middle"/></a> </p> <p> <a href="index.html"><img border="1" alt="MultiTexture Design Pattern" title="MultiTexture Design Pattern" hspace="10" src="MultiTextureDesignPatternSceneGraph.png" width="102" height="132" align="middle"/></a> </p> </td> </tr> </tbody> </table>
